span.span: The Plumsted Township School District shall inspire
all students to realize their personal potential. A rich
and challenging learning environment, in partnership with the
community, will develop critical thinkers, lifelong learners
and productive citizens in an emerging global society.

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

strong.span: The Plumsted Township School District will be closed beginning March 16th until further notice. Please click here for notice from the Superintendent.
Effective 3/13/20, High School and Middle School practices and scrimmages are being canceled until further notice.

strong.span: Plumsted Twp Board of Education Notice of Meetings
The Plumsted Township Board of Education will hold a Special Meeting on the following date:

for the purpose of conducting a public hearing on the 2020-2021 budget. The meeting will be held at the New Egypt High School 117 Evergreen Road, New Egypt, NJ 08533, and will convene at 6:30 p.m. for executive session and 7:30 p.m. for public session.

a.title: Go to comments for Plumsted Twp Board of Education Notice of Meetings

p.span: uses ParentSquare for school communication, primarily with email, text and app notifications. ParentSquare automatically generates an account for each parent, using their preferred email address and phone number. We encourage parents to access their accounts so they can download the mobile app and update their preferences on when and how they are notified.

p.strong: Here’s what you can do with ParentSquare:

li.span: Receive messages from the school via email, text or app notification
Choose to receive information as it comes or all at once at 6pm daily
Comment on school postings to engage in your school community
Direct message teachers, staff and other parents

span.p: The NJDOE is a part of the Interagency Task Force to Combat Youth Bias. The Task Force is hosting community listening sessions to hear from members of the public, particularly parents and children about incidents of bias.
